requests.name: Diapers (Merries diapers XXL)
requests.description:
Patient is a 9YO child with a life limiting medical condition and complex medical care needs. Patient is fully bed and wheelchair bound and can only drink milk via a special tube inserted through his stomach. Father had lost his job recently and hence had taken on the care of patient at home in the interim as he sourced for another job. Mother is currently working but her sole income cannot sufficiently cover for patient's high medical and care expenses. The couple also have another 3 YO child. The family expressed that they struggled with affording patient's care consummables in particular the diapers and milk. Patient only uses Merries diapers XXL due to his sensitive skin (patient currently uses about 8.5 packets a month). Hence, they would appreciate any help that they could get, to help tide over this difficult period (for the next 3-4 months) as family actively works towards stabilising themselves. 
Thank you.
